punar sasphārayet buddhān yama antaka ākāra sannibhān
sattvaḥ ca tri adhva sambhūtān ripūṇām
ghātitān bhāvayet kruddhaḥ idam vajra ājñā maṇḍalam
trikāya ājñāvajraḥ nāma samādhiḥ
kāya vāc citta vajraiḥ tu sva mantra artha guṇena vā
athavā pauṣpa
samaye ājñācakra pravartanam
rakṣā artham sarva mantrāṇām kāryam jñāna agra vajriṇām
idam tat sarva buddhānām bodhi rakṣā artham ucyate
iti āha bhagavān bodhi cittaḥ
kha vajra madhya gam dharmam vairocana agra sambhavam
dhyātvā trikāya vajra agram āsanam tu prakalpayet
khadhātum sarva buddhaiḥ tu paripūrṇam vibhāvayet
mantra akṣara padam jñānam citta ākāram prakalpayet
punar tu saspharet buddhān citta vajra prabhāvitān
citta vajram iti kṛtvā trikāye tān praveśayet
iti āha bhagavān kha vajra samayaḥ
vajra mantra ratna pradyota karaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
sarva ākāra vara upetam vajra sattvam vibhāvayet
buddhāḥ tu kramaśas sthāpya jalasya upari cakramet
samaya udaka prayogeṇa mūrdhni pāda vibhāvanam
iti āha bhagavān svabhāva śuddhaḥ
vajrodadhi pada ākrāntaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
māhendra maṇḍalam dhyātvā madhye krodhakulam nyaset
karma vajra pada ākrāntam mūrdhni tasya vibhāvayet
iti āha ca
sarva tīrtha pravādi stambhana vajraḥ nāma samādhiḥ
krodha ākāram tri vajra agrān pītakijalka sannibhān

original: girirāja iva sarvān dhyātvā mūrdhni prabhāvayet ||
analyzed: giri rājaḥ iva sarvān dhyātvā mūrdhni prabhāvayet
buddha sainyam api stambhe mriyate na atra saśayaḥ
iti āha bhagavan sarva tathāgata kāya vāc citta sambhavaḥ
sarvasainyastambhanaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
ripu santrāsana samaye idam dhyānam prakalpayet
atikramet yadi buddhaḥ sphuṭate na atra saśayaḥ
iti āha bhagavān tri vajra samayaḥ
hūkāra kīlakam dhyātvā pañca śūla pramāṇataḥ
vajrakīlam kṛtam tena hṛdaye tat vibhāvayet
buddha sainyam api kruddham nāśam gacchet na sa śayaḥ
ripumahāpahāraḥ nāma samādhiḥ

original: nagare vā'pyathavā grāme viṣaye vā prayojayet |
analyzed: nagare vā api athavā grāme viṣaye vā prayojayet
anena nityam bhavet śāntiḥ sarva roga vivarjitā
antarikṣa gatam vajram pañcaśūlam prabhāvayet
kalpa uddāham iva dhyātvā punar sahāram ādiśet  /
sphuraṇam ca punar kāryam ratna cintāmaṇi prabhaiḥ
bhāvayet dharma meghān vai abhiṣekam samādiśet
anena dhyāna vajreṇa duṣpūraḥ api prapūryate
sa bhavet cintāmaṇiḥ śrīmān dāna vajra prasādhakaḥ
buddha meghaiḥ mahā dharmaiḥ vajra sattvaiḥ ca tat sphuret
tri kalpa a sa khyeya sthānam sarva buddhaiḥ adhiṣṭhyate
idam tat sarva buddhānām kāya guhyam anāvilam
sarva sattva roga apanayana vajrasambhavaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
dhyāna vajreṇa samādānam yatra sthāne samācaret
anena dhyāna yogena tiṣṭhan buddhaiḥ adhiṣṭhyate  /
nikhanet daśa diś cakram sphuliṅga jvāla sannibham
iti āha ca
khadhātu madhya gam cintet śānti maṇḍalam uttamam
bimba vairocanam dhyātvā hṛdaye atha pravinyaset
kha dhātum locana agraiḥ ca paripūrṇam vibhāvayet
sahṛtya raśmi piṇḍena ārambhasya nipātane  /
romakūpa agra vivaraiḥ buddha meghān spharet vratī

original: abhiṣekaṁ tadā tasya buddhameghā dadanti hi ||
analyzed: abhiṣekam tadā tasya buddha meghāḥ dadanti hi
anena vajra samayaḥ śrīmān bhavati tad kṣaṇāt
buddha samaya meghavyūhaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
kha vajra madhya gam cintet māhendra maṇḍalam śubham

original: bimbaṁ dharmaparaṁ dhyātvā hṛdaye vā'tha vinyaset || 76 ||
analyzed: bimbam dharma param dhyātvā hṛdaye vā atha vinyaset
kha dhātu bhavana ramyam pāṇḍara ākhyaiḥ prapūrayet
saharet raśmi piṇḍena ratna cintāmaṇi prabham
kāya vāc citta nilaye arthine tat ca nivedayet
romakūpa agra vivare ratna meghān spharet vratī
bhāvayet dharma meghān vai abhiṣekam samādiśet
anena dhyāna vajreṇa duṣpūraḥ api prapūryate
sa bhavet cintāmaṇiḥ śrīmān dāna vajra prasādhakaḥ
dharma samaya meghavyūhaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
kha dhātu madhya gam cintet vajra candra arka maṇḍalam
bimba kha vajra dharma agram arthinaḥ hṛdi vinyaset
buddhaiḥ ca bodhisattvaiḥ ca pūripūrṇam kha maṇḍalam
pañca raśmi prayogeṇa tejaḥ tatra nipātayet
sa bhavet tad kṣaṇāt eva sarva buddha manojñakaḥ
mañjuśrī tulya saṅkāśaḥ sa bhavet para karma kṛt
dadāti ca prahṛṣṭa ātmā abhiṣekam mahā utsukaḥ
vaśam ānayati janān sarvān darśanena eva coditān  /
ratna samaya meghavyūhaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
kha vajram rākṣasaiḥ krūraiḥ caṇḍaiḥ krodha su dāruṇaiḥ
śrṛgālaiḥ vividhaiḥ kākaiḥ gṛdhraiḥ śvānaiḥ prabhāvayet
āgneya maṇḍala stham tu bhāvayet ripavaḥ sadā
apakārī sarva buddhānām dhyātvā yogam prayojayet
antra majjā rudhira ādyam sarva ākṛṣṭam prabhāvayet
nānā praharaṇa dharaiḥ ākrāntaḥ mriyate ripuḥ
buddhaḥ vajradharaḥ vā api yadi anena prabhāvyate
pakṣa abhyantara pūrṇena mriyate na atra saśayaḥ
vajra megha samaya vyūhaḥ nāma samādhiḥ
tri mukham vairocanam cintet śarad kāṇḍa sama prabham
sita kṛṣṇa mahā raktam jaṭā mukuṭa maṇḍitam
tri mukham vajriṇam cintet kṛṣṇa rakta sita ānanam
jaṭā mukuṭa dharam dīptam lokadhātu samākulam
tri mukham rāgiṇam cintet rakta kṛṣṇa sita ānanam
jaṭā mukuṭa sabhogam bhāvayan sidhyate dhruvam
cakram vajram mahā padmam savya pāṇau vibhāvayet
ṣaṣ bhujān bhāvayet vajrān nānā praharaṇa dharān śubhān
locanām tri mukhām cintet sarva sattva hita eṣiṇīm
sita kṛṣṇa mahā raktām cāru rūpām vibhāvayet
kha vajra netrīm mahā rājñīm tri mukhām bhāvayet sadā
kṛṣṇa rakta sita ākārām cāru rūpām vibhāvayet
vāgvajrīm ca mahārājñīm trimukhām bhāvayet sadā
rakta sita kṛṣṇa ākārām cāru varṇām vibhāvayet
vajra utpala dharām vidyām tri mukhām kānti su prabhām
pīta kṛṣṇa sita ākārām bhāvayan jñānam āpnuyāt
yama antakam mahā krodham tri mukham kruddha su prabham
bhayasya api bhayam tīkṣṇam kṛṣṇa varṇam vibhāvayet
aparājitam mahā krodham aṭṭa aṭṭahāsa nādin
tri mukham sphuliṅga gahanam visphurantam vicintayet  /
hayagrīvam mahā krodham kalpa uddāham iva udbhavam
tri mukham duṣṭa pada ākrāntam bhāvayet yogataḥ sadā
vajra amṛtam mahā krodham sphuliṅga ākula cetasam
dīpta vajra nibham krūram bhayasya api bhaya pradam
ṭakki rājam mahākrodham trimukham tri bhaya pradam
catur bhujam bhayasya agram ṭakki rājam prabhāvayet
mahā balam mahā vajram trailokya artha artha dhāriṇam
sarva duṣṭānām tri mukham bhāvayet sadā
nīla daṇḍam mahā krodham trailokyasya bhaya pradam
vajrācalam mahākrodham kekaram vajrasabhavam
khaṅga pāśa dharam saumyam tri mukham bhāvayet vratī
eka akṣaram mahā uṣṇīṣam visphurantam samantataḥ
tri mukham vajriṇam dīptam bhāvayet dhyāna maṇḍale
sumbham jñāna agra dharam krūram bhaya udadhi sama prabham
tri mukham jvālā arci vapuṣam bhāvayet dhyāna su prabham
tejaḥ rāśi jaya uṣṇīṣam ye ca anye mantra vajriṇaḥ
ebhiḥ samaya sambhogaiḥ bhāvanīyāḥ prati prati
amitāni samādhīni mantrāṇām samudāhṛtāḥ

parveta agreṣu ramyeṣu vijaneṣu vaneṣu ca
dhyāna vajram prakurvīta japa mantra prayogataḥ
vajra sattva ādayaḥ sarve mantra dhyāna pracoditāḥ
kurvanti citra karmāṇi vākya vajra vacaḥ yathā
vajra dharma mahā bimbam padmarāga sama prabham
kāya vāc citta mahā vajram tad sthāne kula kalpanam
āveśana vidhim sarvam kārayan siddhi ati dhruvam
stobhastambham mahābimbam āryabhaumam caturthakam
kartavyam siddhi vajreṇa evam siddhi ati śāśvatam
dvādaśa vārṣikām kanyām puruṣam dvādaśa ābdikam
sarva lakṣaṇa sampūrṇam gṛhya āveśam prakalpayet
vidhānāni tu sarvāṇi kṛtvā karma prasādhanam
anyathā hāsyam āpnoti traidhātukeṣu jantuṣu

niścārayāmāsa
atha atas sa pravakṣyāmi kāya maṇḍalam uttamam
citta vajra pratīkāśam sarva maṇḍalam uttamam
ṣoḍaśa hastam prakurvīta catur asram su śobhanam
maṇḍalam sarva buddhānām kāya vajra pratiṣṭhitam
tasya abhyantaratas cakram ālikhet vidhivajrayā
mudrā vajra padam kuryāt mantrāṇām guhyam uttamam
madhye vairocana padam akṣobhya ādīn samālikhet
kāya vāc citta vajra agrīn sarva koṇe niveśayet
krodhān samālikhet dvāri mahā bala parākramān
pūjām kurvīta mantra jñaḥ guhya vajra prabhāvitām
eṣaḥ hi sarva krodhānām samayaḥ duratikramaḥ
avaśyam eva dātavyam viṣ mutra ādyam viśeṣataḥ
eṣaḥ hi sarva mantrāṇām samayaḥ kāya vajriṇām
sarva tathāgata kāya maṇḍalam

original: atha bhagavān vajrapāṇistathāgataḥ sarvavāgvajrasamayameghavyūhaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyedaṁ vāgvajramaṇḍalaṁ svakāyavākcittavajrebhya udājahāra
analyzed: atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ tathāgataḥ sarva vāc vajra samaya meghavyūham nāma samādhim samāpadya idam vāc vajra maṇḍalam sva kāya vāc citta vajrebhyaḥ udājahāra
atha atas sa pravakṣyāmi vāc maṇḍalam uttamam
citta vajra pratīkāśam sarva maṇḍalam uttamam
viśati hastam prakurvīta catur asram vidhānataḥ
catuṣkoṇam catur dvāram sūtrayet vajra bhāvanaiḥ
vajradharma mahā rājam vidveṣam avatārayet  /
tasya madhye mahā cakram ālikhet parimaṇḍalam
sarva mudrām samāsena ālikhet vidhi tatparaḥ
amitāyuḥ mahāmudrām tasya madhye niveśayet
tat eva vajra padam ramyam sarveṣām parikalpayet
parisphuṭam vidhānena kṛtvā maṇḍalam uttamam
guhya pūjām tatas kuryāt evam tuṣyanti vajriṇaḥ
viṣ mūtra śukra samayaiḥ pūjya siddhiḥ avāpyate
eṣaḥ hi sarva buddhānām samayaḥ duratikramaḥ
sarva tathāgata vāc maṇḍalam

original: atha bhagavān vajrapāṇistathāgataḥ samantameghavyūhaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyedaṁ paramaguhyamaṇḍalarahasyaṁ svakāyavākcittavajrebhyo niścārayāmāsa
analyzed: atha bhagavān vajrapāṇiḥ tathāgataḥ samantameghavyūham nāma samādhim samāpadya idam parama guhya maṇḍala rahasyam sva kāya vāc citta vajrebhyaḥ niścārayāmāsa

iti sarva tathāgata kāya vāc citta vajra jñāna rahasyaḥ ayam parama guhyaḥ

original: atha bhagavān vajrapāṇistathāgataḥ sarvamaṇḍalacakrasambhavaṁ nāma samādhiṁ samāpadyedaṁ sarvamaṇḍalakāyavākcittaguhyajaṁ svakāyavākcittavajrebhya  #

analyzed: idam uktvā te sarva tathāgatāḥ te ca bodhisattvāḥ mahāsattvāḥ sva kāya vāc citta vajreṣu viharantam kāya vāc citta vajrasya kāya vāc cittam sva kāya vāc cittena ālambya
tūṣṇīm abhūvan
iti

original: iti śrīsarvatathāgatakāyavākcittarahasyātirahasye guhyasamāje mahāguhyatantrarāje sarvaguhyanirdeśavajrajñānādhiṣṭhānaṁ nāma paṭalo'ṣṭādaśaḥ
analyzed: iti śrī sarva tathāgata kāya vāc citta rahasya ati rahasye guhya samāje mahā guhya tantra rāje sarvaguhyanirdeśavajrajñānādhiṣṭhānam nāma paṭalaḥ aṣṭādaśaḥ
samāptaḥ ayam śrī guhya samājasya tantra rājasya pūrva arddha kāyaḥ
